channel.title: Connecting queries with query_results
channel.description:
Im trying to fetch specific queries and to get their query results for auditing. I tried using both query_hash and last_quer_data_id to join both tables but I always get very partial results. A lot of times the queries doesnt have a corresponding query_result entry although I know they were ran
Thanks for your help

item.title: Connecting queries with query_results
item.dc:creator: jesse
item.description:
Do any of these queries use parameters?

Read full topic
